diff_act: 1.provide a visual indication of the incoming call
2.display the group identity of the voice call on the MMI
3.automatically connect group or broadcast calls to the handset when it is off the hook
4.automatically connect group or broadcast calls to the handset

regen.absent_element: automatic connection of group or broadcast calls to the loudspeaker when the handset is off the hook and to the handset when it is off the hook is partially described but connection to the loudspeaker when the handset is in use is not fully specified
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically connect group or broadcast calls to the loudspeaker if the handset is in use and to the handset if it is off the hook.

regen.absent_element: connection of call to loudspeaker when handset is off the hook
regen.new_specification: Group or broadcast calls shall automatically be connected to the loudspeaker if the handset is not in use and to the handset when it is off the hook

regen.absent_element: connection of group or broadcast calls to the loudspeaker when the handset is off the hook
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically connect group or broadcast calls to the loudspeaker if the handset is in use and on the hook, otherwise it connects to the handset.

label: be connected to the handset if the handset is off hook.
absence: situation of the handset is off hook
